name: I wanna be like Earth!
description:
Little Planet observes Earth for a long time.

"It is so beautiful!", little Planet says. "So many lifeforms, full of green and blue colors like no other planet I have ever seen in my entire existence!"

And so, Planet wants to be like Earth. It starts its research, looking at how can it approach such amazing evolution. In likely no time, Planet finishes its researches and discover the main elements it is missing to start forming life on its surface. With that in mind, it parts to its galaxy to try and find elements to borrow from other planets!

- Use WASD or Arrows to move
- Use Spacebar or Left Mouse button to activate your gravity field and absorb elements from other planets

- You need to find and collect the four elements, each one contained in a single planet over the galaxy, to win the game
- Avoid hitting other planets and roaming asteroids or you might lose your life!

Game made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #2 by Leonardo 'Layzyn' da Luz.

Thank you for playing!
